title: Nigeriana Quotable Quotes
description: nikonyechi.com/booksFirst published in Nigeria in 2010, Nigeriana Quotable Quotes is a collection of over 1,000 vintage quotations from Nigerians (and about Nigeria), painstakingly compiled and ordered by theme. It is an invaluable resource for those interested in Nigerian culture, literature and politics. Chief (Sir) Nik Nnamdi Ikechukwu Onyechi is a librarian, information scientist, documentalist, educator and educational administrator, born in Lagos in 1942. He hails from Ogidi in Idemili North LGA of Anambra State, Nigeria. Before his retirement he was Chief Lecturer, Head of Department and Dean of School, Federal Polytechnic, Nekede Owerri, Imo State.
author: N. Nik Onyechi
